### Accessibility Review
<!-- If this PR affects the UI, please complete the following accessibility checklist -->
- [ ] All interactive elements are keyboard accessible
- [ ] All form inputs have proper labels
- [ ] All images have appropriate alt text
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG standards (4.5:1 for text)
- [ ] ARIA attributes are used correctly
- [ ] Focus management is implemented for dynamic content
- [ ] Screen reader announcements work properly
- [ ] Reduced motion preferences are respected
